timeline.bodyText:
I only looked at the docs portion of this PR.

Please change "clutser" to "cluster"
Please add "gfsh" in to this sentence, since we're not substituting a different property, and I think that you mean to use a gfsh command instead.  Something like "Use the gfsh import or export cluster-configuration command instead."
timeline.author: karensmolermiller
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -117,7 +117,7 @@ Valid values are in the range 0...2147483647 cluster-configuration-dir -This property specifies the directory in which the cluster configuration related disk-store and artifacts are stored. This property is only applicable to dedicated locators that have "enable-cluster-configuration" set to true. +Deprecated. Use import/export clutser-configuration command instead. This property specifies the directory in which the cluster configuration related disk-store and artifacts are stored. This property is only applicable to dedicated locators that have "enable-cluster-configuration" set to true.

replies.bodyText: I also recommend mentioning that it currently does nothing. We've done this in the past for APIs that do nothing -- deprecate and document that it does nothing and what the user should do instead.
replies.author: kirklund
